channel.title: Openai.com/Blog on .NET Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Openai.com/Blog on .NET Ramblings

item.title: Growing impact and scale with ChatGPT
item.description: Discover how HiBob uses ChatGPT Enterprise and custom GPTs to scale AI adoption, boost revenue, streamline HR workflows, and deliver AI-powered features in the Bob platform. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/hibob

item.title: Disrupting malicious uses of AI: October 2025
item.description: Discover how OpenAI is detecting and disrupting malicious uses of AI in our October 2025 report. Learn how we’re countering misuse, enforcing policies, and protecting users from real-world harms. Link to article: https://openai.com/global-affairs/disrupting-malicious-uses-of-ai-october-2025

item.title: Codex is now generally available
item.description: OpenAI Codex is now generally available with powerful new features for developers: a Slack integration, Codex SDK, and admin tools like usage dashboards and workspace management—making Codex easier to use and manage at scale. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/codex-now-generally-available

item.title: Introducing apps in ChatGPT and the new Apps SDK
item.description: We’re introducing a new generation of apps you can chat with, right inside ChatGPT. Developers can start building them today with the new Apps SDK, available in preview. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/introducing-apps-in-chatgpt

item.title: AMD and OpenAI announce strategic partnership to deploy 6 gigawatts of AMD GPUs
item.description: AMD and OpenAI have announced a multi-year partnership to deploy 6 gigawatts of AMD Instinct GPUs, beginning with 1 gigawatt in 2026, to power OpenAI’s next-generation AI infrastructure and accelerate global AI innovation. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/openai-amd-strategic-partnership

item.title: Accelerating AI adoption in Europe
item.description: OpenAI and Allied for Startups release the Hacktivate AI report with 20 actionable policy ideas to accelerate AI adoption in Europe, boost competitiveness, and empower innovators. Link to article: https://openai.com/global-affairs/accelerating-ai-uptake-in-europe

item.title: Introducing AgentKit, new Evals, and RFT for agents
item.description: Today, we’re releasing new tools to help developers go from prototype to production faster: AgentKit, expanded evals capabilities, and reinforcement fine-tuning for agents. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/introducing-agentkit

item.title: With GPT-5, Wrtn builds lifestyle AI for millions in Korea
item.description: Wrtn scaled AI apps to 6.5M users in Korea with GPT-5, creating ‘Lifestyle AI’ that blends productivity, creativity, and learning—now expanding across East Asia. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/wrtn

item.title: OpenAI announces strategic collaboration with Japan’s Digital Agency
item.description: OpenAI and Japan’s Digital Agency partner to advance generative AI in public services, support international AI governance, and promote safe, trustworthy AI adoption worldwide. Link to article: https://openai.com/global-affairs/strategic-collaboration-with-japan-digital-agency
